amendment.description: To increase funding for the United States Marshals Service to ensure full funding for the Adam Walsh Child Protection and Safety Act of 2006 and offset the increase by reducing funding for the Advanced Technology Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3294 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 0. Record Vote Number: 366.

action.text: Amendment SA 3294 proposed by Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S12895-12896, S12905; text: CR S12895) To increase funding for the United States Marshals Service to ensure full funding for the Adam Walsh Child Protection and Safety Act of 2006 and offset the increase by reducing funding for the Advanced Technology Program.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3294 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 0. Record Vote Number: 366.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3294 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 0. Record Vote Number: 366.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3294 proposed by Senator Ensign.
